title: What is the Basel tennis schedule?
description: The Swiss Indoors Basel main draw continues Tuesday. Stars who will be in action include big-serving American Ben Shelton, Holger Rune and Stefanos Tsitsipas. View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 22 OCTOBER 2024 Center Court - start 2 p.m. [WC] Dominic Stricker (SUI) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) Followed By Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs [6] Ben Shelton (USA) Not Before 6 p.m. Nicolas Jarry (CHI) vs [4] Holger Rune (DEN) [3] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) IWB Court 1 - start 12 p.m. Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Albano Olivetti (FRA) vs Jean-Julien Rojer (NED) / Joe Salisbury (GBR) [WC] Denis Shapovalov (CAN) vs Juncheng Shang (CHN) [Q] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs Alexander Bublik (KAZ) Marin Cilic (CRO) vs Alejandro Tabilo (CHI) Followed By After Suitable Rest - Arthur Fils (FRA) / Ben Shelton (USA) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) / Pedro Martinez (ESP) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Basel

Learn who is in action at the ATP 500 event

October 21, 2024

Daniel Kopatsch/Getty Images

The Swiss indoors Basel will be held from 21-27 October. By ATP Staff

The Swiss Indoors Basel main draw continues Tuesday. Stars who will be in action include big-serving American Ben Shelton, Holger Rune and Stefanos Tsitsipas.

View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 22 OCTOBER 2024

Center Court - start 2 p.m.
[WC] Dominic Stricker (SUI) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED)

Followed By
Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs [6] Ben Shelton (USA)

Not Before 6 p.m.
Nicolas Jarry (CHI) vs [4] Holger Rune (DEN)
[3] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG)

IWB Court 1 - start 12 p.m.
Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Albano Olivetti (FRA) vs Jean-Julien Rojer (NED) / Joe Salisbury (GBR)
[WC] Denis Shapovalov (CAN) vs Juncheng Shang (CHN)
[Q] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs Alexander Bublik (KAZ)
Marin Cilic (CRO) vs Alejandro Tabilo (CHI)

Followed By
After Suitable Rest - Arthur Fils (FRA) / Ben Shelton (USA) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) / Pedro Martinez (ESP)

Read More News View All News
